name: Microcosm
details:
Micro-Looping Granular DelayMicrocosm rearranges and reinterprets your sound in new and exciting ways using a variety of granular sampling, delay, and looping techniques. Cascading microloops can be locked into tight tap-tempo synced rhythms, diffused into glacial ambient textures, woven into hypnotic drones, and much more.
FEATURE OVERVIEW
    11 unique granular and looping effects with 44 preset variations
    Stereo Input/Output
    Expression Input, mappable to many controls
    MIDI In/Out/Thru, clock synchronization
    60 sec. Phrase Looper with many configuration options
    16 User Preset slots for saving loops and settings
    Stereo Reverb (with 4 reverb styles) 
    “Hold” sampler function to freeze effects and patterns
    Adjustable Pitch Modulation
    Resonant Lowpass Filter
    Choose between True Bypass Switching / Buffered Bypass with trails
    Tap Tempo
A limited number of Microcosms are available for pre-order now, shipping in April 2020. 
https://www.hologramelectronics.com/microcosm
